content:
Felings 
 Clare Verbek, Thembani 
 Dladla and Zanele Buthelezi 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My heart fels a lot of 
 
 things. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I fel hapy when my 
 
 grany tels us stories in 
 
 the evening. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I fel sily when I play with 
 
 my friend. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I fel bad when my dad 
 
 says he does not have 
 
 money. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I fel loved when my mom 
 
 gives me a hug. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5
